contents: Article 33 (Senior Non-Executive Director) ① The Corporation shall have one senior non-executive director. Revised May 26, 2015, ② The senior non-executive director is elected from among non-executive directors. ③ The senior non-executive director performs the duties of the chairman of the board of directors when the chairman's participation in the board of directors is restricted by the Public Institutions Management Act and these Articles of Incorporation. ., ④ Matters concerning the qualifications and performance of duties of the senior non-executive director shall be determined by the “Board of Directors Operation Regulations.”
